text: Some women can't wait to be mothers, but Cameran Eubanks wasn't exactly one of them. We watched Cameran contemplate whether or not she should start a family with husband Jason Wimberly for a few seasons on Southern Charm. But then everything seemed to change last April when Cameran announced that she and Jason were expecting their first child, a girl. Fast - forward to November 11, 2017, and the Southern Charm couple welcomed little Palmer Corrine Wimberly into the world. Now that Cameran is five months into motherhood and has experienced all of the ups and downs it has to offer, we're all dying to know if the Southern Charm mom is now eager to keep on expanding her family. ` ` No, I will not have more
